subject: Boxing
Olympic Games (2012)
lead_paragraph: Katie Taylor, a 26-year-old born-again Christian, captivated a nation as she won Olympic gold in boxing. During her match, people across Ireland chanted, “Katie, Katie, Katie.”
snippet: Katie Taylor, a 26-year-old born-again Christian, captivated a nation as she won Olympic gold in boxing. During her match, people across Ireland chanted, “Katie, Katie, Katie.”
